#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <string>

using namespace std;

int main() {
	
	int t, n, b, r;
	string s = "012345678", str;
	
	scanf("%d", &t );
	
	while( t-- ) {
		
		scanf("%d %d", &n, &b );
		str = "";
		
		if( n == 0 )
			printf("0\n");
		else {
		
			while( n > 0 ) {
			
				r = n % b;
				str = s[ r ] + str;
				n /= b;
			}
		
			cout << str << endl;
		}
	}
	
	return 0;
}
